about_screen__back_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the main_menu_screen, which displays the main menu interface including a top toolbar with a search input, a button to sort items, a button to add items to favorites, and a more options button. Below the toolbar, there is a breadcrumb navigation bar displaying the current storage option. The main content area displays a list of items in a scrollable view. Each item in the list includes an icon, a name button, a details button, and a date button. There is also a floating action button at the bottom right corner of the screen. The bottom of the screen contains a tab bar with options for Files, Recents, and Storage, with the Files tab selected.

recents_screen__recents_tab.name: recents_screen__recents_tab

recents_screen__storage_tab.name: recents_screen__storage_tab
recents_screen__storage_tab.description: A tab button located at the bottom of the screen to navigate to the Storage screen.

recents_screen__tab_bar.name: recents_screen__tab_bar

storage_screen__main_view_pager.name: storage_screen__main_view_pager
storage_screen__main_view_pager.description: A scrollable view displaying storage usage information, including sections for free space, images, videos, audio, documents, archives, and others.
storage_screen__main_view_pager.effect: open the main_menu_screen, which displays the main menu interface, including a top toolbar with a search input, a button to sort items, a button to add items to favorites, and a more options button. Below the toolbar, there is a breadcrumb navigation bar displaying the current storage option. The main content area displays a list of items in a scrollable view. Each item in the list includes an icon, a name button, a details button, and a date button. There is also a floating action button at the bottom right corner of the screen. The bottom of the screen contains a tab bar with options for Files, Recents, and Storage, with the Files tab selected.
